options.__comment1__: Use blanking or not (NOTE: if TRUE, images must respect VESA resolutions)

random.__comment1__: Possible pixel harmonic for capture synchronization frequencies
random.__comment2__: Gaussian noise with random sigma over specified range [sigma1, simga2]
random.__comment3__: Random frequency error (Hz) over specified range [f1, f2]
random.__comment4__: Random phase error over specified range (normalized by pi~3.1415...)
